data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Raskoti, Bhakta Bahadur, Schuiteman, Andre, Jin, Wei-Tao, Jin, Xiao-Hua (2017): A taxonomic revision of Herminium L. (Orchidoideae, Orchidaceae). PhytoKeys 79: 1-74, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.79.11215, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.79.11215
